job_tasks.phrase: align technical solutions with strategic goals
job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'align technical solutions with strategic goals' directly relates to understanding business objectives and how technology can support them.

job_tasks.phrase: translate business needs into technical requirements
job_tasks.justification: This phrase explicitly describes the process of converting business requirements into actionable technical specifications.

job_tasks.phrase: exposing the functionality built by the rest of the team towards our customers
job_tasks.justification: This describes the core responsibility of building user-facing interfaces to deliver functionality.

job_tasks.phrase: Making the concept of generative AI accessible, reliable, and customizable
job_tasks.justification: This implies building software to present and manage generative AI features for users.

job_tasks.phrase: Exploring new techniques and interfaces to ensure customer adoption and value
job_tasks.justification: This points to the development of user interfaces and exploring new ways to deliver value through software.

job_tasks.phrase: You'll be working closely with product management, data scientists, and back-end engineers
job_tasks.justification: This highlights collaboration within a software development team structure.

job_tasks.phrase: constantly looking to deliver new functionality to increase customer adoption and product market fit
job_tasks.justification: This describes the iterative process of software development aimed at improving product value and market acceptance.

soft_skills.phrase: working closely with product management, data scientists, and back-end engineers
Making the concept of generative AI accessible, reliable, and customizable

classification.rationale: The job description heavily emphasizes front-end development and customer-facing interfaces, with a focus on making generative AI accessible. While generative AI is mentioned, the core responsibilities and tasks described lean towards traditional software development and user interface design rather than building, fine-tuning, or deploying generative models themselves. There is a lack of technical depth regarding AI model development or MLOps.
